entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few showers ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of thunderstorms early this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 27 May 2016

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of thunderstorms in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 15. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 27 May 2016

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the evening with risk of thunderstorms. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 27 May 2016
